overview: Gil Avni (33) is hospitalized in the intensive care unit, diagnosed with cerebral edema, ventilated and anesthetized. The doctors give him 4 hours to live. Gil understands that he is going to die. What he does not understand is, in light of his medical condition, how it is possible for him to hear and understand everything that is happening around him His bed? On a timeline of 44 hours, Gil's chilling testimony is revealed, minute by minute, in front of the testimony of the teams fighting for his life, and his relatives and family members rushing to come and say goodbye to him in his last hours. A rare glimpse into forbidden territory.
title: 44 Hours
